mapper.select: SELECT lt.lec_seq, lt.lec_nm, lt.lec_enr, lt.lec_contents, lt.lec_tm, lt.lec_gl, lt.lec_pl, TO_DAYS(substring_index(lec_ed,' ',1)) - TO_DAYS(substring_index(lec_st,' ',1)) total, (substring_index(lt.lec_st,' ','1'))stDay, (substring_index(lt.lec_ed,' ','1'))edDay, lt.enr_user, lt.upd_user, lt.rm_seq, lt.enr_date, rl.user_id, uf.user_email, uf.user_addr FROM tb_lecture lt LEFT JOIN tb_request_list rl ON lt.lec_seq = rl.lec_seq LEFT JOIN tb_userinfo uf ON rl.user_id = uf.loginID WHERE lt.user_id =#{loginId} GROUP BY lt.lec_seq

SELECT lt.lec_seq, lt.lec_nm, rl.user_id, uf.user_email, uf.user_addr FROM tb_lecture lt LEFT JOIN tb_request_list rl ON lt.lec_seq = rl.lec_seq LEFT JOIN tb_userinfo uf ON rl.user_id = uf.loginID WHERE rl.lec_seq =#{lec_seq}
SELECT cns_seq, cns_date, cns_place, cns_cstnt, cns_cstee, cns_nm, cns_content, cns_check FROM tb_counsel WHERE cns_cstee =#{user_id} AND cns_nm =#{lec_nm}
